short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark mode and colour themes for Onshape. Toggle dark mode. Pick from our themes or pick your own colour.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Onshape Dark Mode - your solution for a more comfortable and customizable Onshape experience.

Features:
Dark Mode Toggle: Instantly switch to a dark interface for reduced eye strain during those long design sessions.
Color Themes: Choose from a range of professionally crafted themes to suit your mood and style.
Custom Color Picker: Tailor your workspace even further by selecting your own custom color scheme.
Enhanced Productivity: Improve focus and productivity with a design environment that adapts to your preferences.
Why Onshape Dark Mode?
Onshape Dark Mode transforms your Onshape workspace with a sleek and modern interface. Whether you're working late into the night or simply prefer a darker aesthetic, this extension provides the flexibility you need.

Easy to Use:
Simply toggle Dark Mode on or off with a single click. Customize your experience further by selecting from our curated themes, or unleash your creativity with the custom color picker.

Get Started:
Install Onshape Dark Mode today and elevate your Onshape experience to a whole new level of comfort and style.
